text: Bernie Guthrie (22 September 1911 – 26 April 1982) was an Australian rules footballer who played for the Collingwood Football Club and North Melbourne Football Club in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Bernie Guthrie's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1911 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:North Melbourne Football Club players
title: Bernie Guthrie
